title: Action Learning-Based Organizational Learning and Career Development Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical competencies and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service/in-service teachers. Emphasizes organizational problem-solving skills through project-based assessments in digital device-enabled LMS environments

learning_goals: Perform action learning projects for math-based problem-solving in real work situations at least three times

Within 6 months, learners build a collaborative learning community involving three or more departments within an organization, operate regular knowledge-sharing sessions at least twice a month, and achieve over 80% positive evaluations in community satisfaction surveys.
Develop and execute a personalized career development plan, submitting a completion report (80% or higher completion rate)
Produce learning materials using an LMS platform and provide peer feedback at least five times
Propose at least one organizational improvement plan based on action learning project reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
